title: v1.6.3.6-v4 Documentation Update
details:
Updated documentation for v1.6.3.6-v4 release which includes:

**v1.6.3.6-v4 New Features:**
1. Position/Size Logging - Full trace visibility from pointer event → background → storage
2. setWritingTabId() Export - Content scripts can set tab ID for storage ownership
3. Broadcast Deduplication - Circuit breaker in background.js (10+ broadcasts/100ms trips)
4. Hydration Flag - `_isHydrating` in UICoordinator suppresses orphaned window warnings
5. sender.tab.id Only - GET_CURRENT_TAB_ID uses sender.tab.id exclusively, removed active tab fallback

**Key Files Changed:**
- QuickTabHandler.js: handleGetCurrentTabId() uses sender.tab.id ONLY
- storage-utils.js: New setWritingTabId() export
- content.js: Calls setWritingTabId() after getting tab ID
- UICoordinator.js: _isHydrating flag for hydration phase
- background.js: _shouldAllowBroadcast() for broadcast dedup
- CreateHandler.js: _getOriginTabId() and _logOriginTabIdAssignment()
- UpdateHandler.js: _doPersist() logging

**Documentation Files Updated:**
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (13KB)
- All .github/agents/*.md files (version references)

**Key Timing Constants Added:**
- BROADCAST_HISTORY_WINDOW_MS = 100
- BROADCAST_CIRCUIT_BREAKER_LIMIT = 10
